excerpt: "Jointly owned by Sony Music Publishing and Universal Music Publishing Group, APM holds a catalog of 1.3 million tracks sourced from 120 libraries, and says its music is used in a wide range of media, from indie films to blockbuster studio releases, TV shows, commercials, video games, and online content."
